summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting easements over a portion of the southeast one-quarter of Section 2, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; portions of the southwest one-quarter of Section 1, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; portions of the northwest one-quarter of Section 1, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; portions of government Lot 1, Section 2, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, W.M.; for watermain and hydrant purposes. (Richmond Beach Watermains, Phase II)
